title: Emilia Pérez Oscar Nom Sparks Massive Backlash Over Past Racist Remarks
shortdescription: Karla Sofía Gascón's historic nomination drowned in controversy.
author: Gossip Guru

content.content: /images/Emilia Pérez Oscar Nom Sparks Massive Backlash Over Past Racist Remarks.webp

Karla Sofía Gascón made history as the first openly trans Best Actress nominee for Emilia Pérez — but celebration quickly turned to outrage when decade-old tweets resurfaced containing racist, anti-Semitic, and transphobic remarks.
Petitions with over 200,000 signatures demand the Academy rescind the nomination. Co-stars Zoe Saldaña and Selena Gomez have remained silent.
